text: Caligula is 2006 German-language opera by Detlev Glanert in four acts to a libretto by Hans-Ulrich Treichel, freely adapted from the 1945 play by Albert Camus. The published version by Boosey & Hawkes also includes an English version by Amanda Holden.Caligula sheet music, Boosey & HawkesMargaret Ross Griffel, Operas in German: A Dictionary 1442247975 2018, p. 74: "Caligula, opera in four acts by Detlev Glanert; libretto (Ger) by Hans-Ulrich Treichel, after Albert Camus. ... Oper Frankfurt, with Ashley Holland (Caligula), Michaela Schuster (Caesonia), Martin Wölfel (Helicon), and Gregory Frank (Cherea)" The opera premiered at the Oper Frankfurt, conducted by Markus Stenz, directed by .Chronik Jahrgangsband 2007, p. 153 3577141077: "Ernst Christian Schütt – 2008. In seiner Oper Caligula beleuchtet Detlev Glanert den Wandel des römischen Kaisers vom vorbildlichen Herrscher zum grausamen Tyrannen.
